field.name: summary
field.value: startable facility fails to choose start or stop methods if method overload exists

field.name: description
field.value:
When start or stop method on startable component is chosen by startMethod/stopMethod attribute in Windsor configuration and selected method has overloads besides version without parameters, component start or stop will fail with AmbiguousMatchException exception.
Fix is simple. Just provide types parameter with value Type.EmptyTypes when calling method Type.GetMethod() in StartConcern.cs and StopConcern.cs.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: can you provide a testcase with patch?
